title: Trump, Mayor Keisha Lance Bottoms, Fired Atlanta Officers and more.
itunes:title: Trump, Mayor Keisha Lance Bottoms, Fired Atlanta Officers and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! We are alive and well. Steve has not given permission to anyone but God to guide him. Steve has made some stunning observations that he will share with us. Trump threatens protesters with military force. The Mayor of Atlanta shares her thoughts and feelings about the protesting and keeping the city stable. The music industry is pausing their everyday operations to protest police violence against the black community. George Floyd's family released the results of an independent autopsy. We speak to Maya who is a salon owner in Atlanta. Two officers shown using excessive force on two students in Atlanta were fired. LoCash and TLC sang "Unpretty" together on The CW. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve warns us about how protests are deflated and encourages us to go home.
